### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumptionData (
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    device_id UUID,
    location_id UUID,
    energy_consumed DECIMAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (timestamp, device_id)
)

UPDATE EnergyConsumptionData SET energy_consumed = 50 WHERE timestamp = '2022-03-15 12:00:00' AND device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumptionData (
    id BIGINT,
    date DATE,
    time TIME,
    energy_consumed DECIMAL,
    PRIMARY KEY(id)
)

CREATE TABLE EnergyConsumptionTrends (
    trend_id BIGINT,
    trend_name VARCHAR(255),
    trend_description TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY(trend_id)
)
